00129 template <typename Value>
00130 TMultiAttribute<Value>::TMultiAttribute(
00131                             iattr::IAttributesManager* attributeOwnerPtr,
00132                             const std::string& attributeId,
00133                             const std::string& attributeDescription,
00134                             int attributeFlags,
00135                             int changeFlags,
00136                             int elementsCount,
00137                             Value* valuesPtr)
00138        :BaseClass(attributeOwnerPtr, attributeId, attributeDescription, attributeFlags, changeFlags)
00139 {
00140        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00141               m_values.push_back(valuesPtr[i]);
00142        }
00143 }

00147 void TMultiAttribute<Value>::SetValues(const ValueList& valueList)
00148 {
00149        SetValues<ValueList>(valueList.begin(), valueList.end());
00150 }

00153 template <typename Value>
00154 template <class ContainerImpl>
00155 void TMultiAttribute<Value>::SetValues(typename ContainerImpl::const_iterator beginIter, typename ContainerImpl::const_iterator endIter)
00156 {
00157        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(m_attributeOwnerPtr, m_changeFlags);
00158 
00159        ResetValues();
00160 
00161        while (beginIter != endIter){
00162               InsertValue(*beginIter);
00163 
00164               ++beginIter;
00165        }
00166 }

00183 template <typename Value>
00184 Value TMultiAttribute<Value>::GetValueAt(int index) const
00185 {
00186        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00187        I_ASSERT(index < GetValuesCount());
00188 
00189        return m_values[index];
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 template <typename Value>
00194 void TMultiAttribute<Value>::SetValueAt(int index, const Value& value)
00195 {
00196        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00197        I_ASSERT(index < GetValuesCount());
00198 
00199        if (m_values[index] != value){
00200               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(m_attributeOwnerPtr, m_changeFlags);
00201 
00202               m_values[index] = value;
00203        }
00204 }

00207 template <typename Value>
00208 void TMultiAttribute<Value>::InsertValue(const Value& value)
00209 {
00210        m_values.push_back(value);
00211 }

00214 template <typename Value>
00215 void TMultiAttribute<Value>::ResetValues()
00216 {
00217        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(m_attributeOwnerPtr, m_changeFlags);
00218        
00219        m_values.clear();
00220 }

00262 // reimplemented (ISerializable)

00264 template <typename Value>
00265 bool TMultiAttribute<Value>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00266 {
00267        bool retVal = true;
00268 
00269        bool isStoring = archive.IsStoring();
00270 
00271        static iser::CArchiveTag valuesTag("Values", "List of attribute values");
00272        static iser::CArchiveTag valueTag("Value", "Single Value");
00273 
00274        int valuesCount = 0;
00275 
00276        if (isStoring){
00277               valuesCount = int(m_values.size());
00278        }
00279 
00280        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(valuesTag, valueTag, valuesCount);
00281 
00282        if (!isStoring){
00283               if (!retVal){
00284                      return false;
00285               }
00286 
00287               m_values.resize(valuesCount);
00288        }
00289 
00290        for (int i = 0; i < valuesCount; ++i){
00291               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(valueTag);
00292               Value value = m_values[i];
00293               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(value);
00294               m_values[i] = value;
00295               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(valueTag);
00296        }
00297 
00298        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(valuesTag);
00299 
00300        return retVal;
00301 }
